title: Chances of getting a key fragment?
body: I think rito should increase the chances, I had some  3 S on the course of 6 games and all I got was 2 chest and 0 key fragments. Is there a way to increase the chances of getting a key fragment instead of a chest?

replies.body:
Got 2 key fragments in a row and like a month later still yet to get my 3rd one -.-

And this chest is still waiting patiently to be opened.

Hey! This is your 3rd answer in a row in a post of mine <3... Good job!. Well, just have a premade and get A- and above and you should get key fragments quiet easily. I opened 3 chest without using an rp in less than 2 weeks haha
I normally get them if I've already reached my chest limit
I got them only twice this month. Add me so we can premade sometime

Chests are granted if you or a premade friend earns an S rank if you are playing a champion you own (also must have a chest available). 

Key fragments are handed out occasionally when you win games. 
>>When asked about specifics on key fragment drop rates, **Wingfield** explained they key drop rates are not linear and the rates reset each month:
"Hey all, 
Just want to help clarify some things about key drop rates: 
Key drop rates are NOT linear and **only wins have a chance of dropping a key**. So you will earn key fragments much faster in your earlier wins than you will in your later wins. Or said another way, each incremental key fragment drop is harder than the last (on average... there is variance). This resets on a monthly basis for each player individually. 
The goal is to create a nice ebb and flow. 
**Grade does NOT impact key drop chance. **
**Premades DO increase drop chance. **
Hope that helps clarify "
[(source)](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/03/red-post-collection-hextech-crafting-on.html#6)

The only way to increase your key fragment drop rate is to play in a premade. A [user on Reddit estimated that the rate increased by as much as 5%](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4atwfj/hextech_key_fragment_drop_rate_statistics/) when playing in a 5man (not definitive, drop rate varies for each player).  

The reason behind the low drop rate is to make the system appeal to casual players as well as hardcore players, as explained by Telecasterdude [HERE.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/tFRfHH2M-key-fragment-drop-rates-and-suggestions?comment=0001)
